content: the legend of zelda chuchu crochet pattern by abbys crochet plushies as this is a free pattern based off a known character feel free to share this document but do not market the design or pattern as your own please give credit for the pattern to me abbys crochet plushies tools and materials crochet hook size 3 5 mm 8 ply yarn black yellow orange and light blue *see note 5 polyester fiberfill yarn needle scissors stitch marker sewing pins abbreviations round s round s single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease invisible decrease st s stitch es … x n repeat stitches within parentheses n times n a total of n stitches make up that round size roughly 5 cm wide may change if you use a different hook or yarn size notes 1 i use magic rings to start off my projects if you don t know this method you can chain 2 and make the single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 2 i use the invisible decrease technique when decreasing 3 the eyes for this pattern are crocheted in discontinuous rounds while the body is crocheted in continuous spiral rounds 4 i used the yarn under technique for this project 5 there are quite a few different chuchu variations so feel free to use different colours to create the different types abbys crochet plushies 2024 instructions eyes make 2 start in black yarn and crochet discontinuously by joining the ends of the rounds round your chuchu is done i hope you enjoyed this pattern and if you d like to share your finished creation on instagram please tag
